name: Fire The Zombies
description:
This is a Guard Game, you can control the gun o fire,There are multiple styles of zombies and bosses
need you to destroy.
You can experience a variety of sci-fi shells, such as laser cannons, flame guns, laser cannons, laser cannons and different types of zombie bosses,. Different weapons have different powers, come and experience it.

(The experiment of biochemical zombies failed, resulting in terrible zombies about to invade the army. Our only defense is to operate our weapons to prevent zombies from entering the city. We can switch between different shells to block zombies more quickly and effectively on the road of invasion. Different enemies and different gameplays constitute five different game experiences, ranging from exciting dark nights to cute cartoon levels, as well as big bosses that require firepower!)
